tool_description: (API Deprecated) Get instant access to 140+ million real-time property rent estimates and comparable rental listings with the Realty Mole rental data API. Available nationwide in the US.
name: Rent Estimate
title: Rent Estimate

api_list.name: Property Rent Estimate (Deprecated)
api_list.description: Returns a rent estimate and comparable rental listings for an address or lat/long coordinate. Providing property feature parameters will improve the estimate accuracy. [More info.](https://rapidapi.com/moneals/api/rent-estimate/details)

optional_parameters.name: daysOld
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of days since comparable listings were last seen on the market, with a minimum of 1

optional_parameters.name: propertyType
optional_parameters.description: The type of the property. Supported values are: `Single Family`, `Condo`, `Townhouse`, `Manufactured`, `Duplex-Triplex`, `Apartment`

optional_parameters.name: maxRadius
optional_parameters.description: The maximum distance between comparable listings and the subject property, in kilometers. Defaults to 50 if not provided

optional_parameters.name: bathrooms
optional_parameters.description: The number of bathrooms in the property. Supports fractions to indicate partial bathrooms

optional_parameters.name: squareFootage
optional_parameters.description: The total living area size of the property, in square feet

optional_parameters.name: compCount
optional_parameters.description: The number of comparable listings returned by the API, between 5 and 25. Defaults to 10 if not provided

optional_parameters.name: latitude
optional_parameters.description: The latitude of the property. The `latitude`/`longitude` can be provided instead of the `address` parameter

optional_parameters.name: bedrooms
optional_parameters.description: The number of bedrooms in the property

optional_parameters.name: address
optional_parameters.description: The property address in the format of 'Street, City, State, Zip'. You need to provide either the `address` or the `latitude`/`longitude` parameters
optional_parameters.default: 5500 Grand Lake Drive, San Antonio, TX, 78244

optional_parameters.name: longitude
optional_parameters.description: The longitude of the property. The `latitude`/`longitude` can be provided instead of the `address` parameter
